statements: UPDATE error_circuits SET circuit_name = 'Circuit A', circuit_description = 'Description for Circuit A' WHERE circuit_id = 1;
UPDATE error_circuits SET correction_method = 'Method B', detection_method = 'Method A' WHERE circuit_type = 'Type X';
UPDATE error_circuits SET circuit_name = 'Power Circuit' WHERE circuit_id = 1;
UPDATE error_circuits SET detection_method = 'Automated' , correction_method = 'Manual' WHERE circuit_name = 'Lighting Circuit';
UPDATE error_detection_circuits SET circuit_name = 'Detection Circuit A', circuit_type = 'Type A' WHERE circuit_id = 1;
UPDATE error_correction_circuits SET correction_method = 'Method B', circuit_name = 'Correction Circuit B' WHERE circuit_id = 2;
UPDATE error_detection_circuits SET circuit_name = 'updated name', detection_method = 'new detection method' WHERE circuit_id = 1;
UPDATE error_correction_circuits SET circuit_type = 'updated type', circuit_name = 'new corrected name' WHERE circuit_id = 2;
UPDATE ErrorDetectionCircuits SET circuit_name = 'New Name' WHERE circuit_id = 1;
UPDATE ErrorCorrectionCircuits SET correction_method = 'Advanced Technique' WHERE circuit_id = 2;
UPDATE ErrorDetectionCircuits SET circuit_name = 'New Detection Circuit' WHERE circuit_id = 1;
UPDATE ErrorCorrectionCircuits SET correction_method = 'Enhanced Correction Method', circuit_type = 'New Type' WHERE circuit_id = 2;
UPDATE ErrorDetectionCircuits SET name = 'New Error Detection Circuit Name' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE CircuitConnections SET error_correction_id = 3 WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE ErrorDetectionCircuits SET description = 'New description' WHERE name = 'Circuit A';
UPDATE ErrorCorrectionCircuits SET name = 'Circuit X', description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE ErrorDetectionCircuits SET circuit_name = 'New Name' WHERE circuit_id = 1;
UPDATE CircuitDetails SET manufacturer = 'New Manufacturer' WHERE circuit_id = 2;
UPDATE ErrorDetectionCircuits SET error_threshold = 0.5 WHERE circuit_id = 1;
UPDATE CircuitDetails SET circuit_description = 'New description', manufacturing_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE circuit_id = 3;
